scripts.db:console: docker compose run postgres psql -h localhost -U postgres -d webapp_dev
scripts.migrate: docker compose run backend yarn db:migrate
scripts.migrate:undo: docker compose run backend yarn prisma migrate reset
scripts.seed: docker compose run backend yarn ts-node scripts/seed/dev.ts
scripts.rebuild: docker compose build backend && docker compose rm --force --stop backend && docker compose up -d backend
scripts.doall: yarn migrate && yarn seed && yarn rebuild
scripts.db:reset: yarn migrate:undo && yarn migrate && yarn seed
